channel.title: Connecting Client To Server
channel.description:
Okay, So i start up my server but when i go to run the client that came with the server it says this
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details press any key to continue...
And when i run the client it just saying connection to update server.
What do i need to do :S
Thanks
Using -
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,413135.0.html Pur3zscape 525 HD conversion. Editted.
Edit - i havent set a port for the client to connect to i could not find that maybe thats the issue?

item.title: Connecting Client To Server
item.dc:creator: @xron89 xron89
item.description:
@xron89 wrote:

Hey when i start the server it says

  • [2011/06/13 17:01:56] [GameEngine]: Listening on port 43594.

So i guess its the right port

but i have not set a port for my client to connect to i am not sure where the file is to set the port for the client or if you even need to.

I tried restart 3 times and no change

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting Client To Server
item.dc:creator: @CreatorAlex CreatorAlex
item.description:
@CreatorAlex wrote:

[quote=“xron89, post:7, topic:399091”]Unexpected server response when i try to login

2011/06/13 16:31:16] [AnonymousIoService-1]: New session from: /127.0.0.1:58909
[2011/06/13 16:31:16] [AnonymousIoService-2]: Session has been closed: /127.0.0.1:58909[/quote]

That happens a lot with Purezscape, try restarting the server?

[hr]

[quote=“xron89, post:7, topic:399091”]Is this an issue ?

ogger.info("Listening on port " + port + “.”);[/quote]

Now that shouldn’t show in the console. Try changing it to logger.info("Listening on port " + port + “.”); if you didn’t just copy it wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting Client To Server
item.dc:creator: @staticfish1 staticfish1
item.description:
@staticfish1 wrote:

If it says listening on port “anything other than 43594” then yes. You need to change the port it connects to.

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting Client To Server
item.dc:creator: @barrowson barrowson
item.description:
@barrowson wrote:

i am having a sort of similar issue on the webclient its says error connecting to server or something like that and i cant log in please help thank you

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting Client To Server
item.dc:creator: @xron89 xron89
item.description:
@xron89 wrote:

Thanks the client loaded woot,

now i got this -

Unexpected server response when i try to login

2011/06/13 16:31:16] [AnonymousIoService-1]: New session from: /127.0.0.1:58909
[2011/06/13 16:31:16] [AnonymousIoService-2]: Session has been closed: /127.0.0.1:58909

it says that loads of times on the server log

Any ideas on that one?

thanks for getting me this far staticfish +rep

Edit -

Is this an issue ?

ogger.info("Listening on port " + port + “.”);

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting Client To Server
item.dc:creator: @staticfish1 staticfish1
item.description:
@staticfish1 wrote:

Actually, you can play just by yourself. Its called localhost. Put the IP the client needs to connect to as 127.0.0.1 and run the server. Then you can play by yourself

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting Client To Server
item.dc:creator: @xron89 xron89
item.description:
@xron89 wrote:

staticfish1:

All compiling does is save the changes you have made to the client. You just need to run the server and client. And it is saying that because it isn’t connecting to any server that is being ran, because of some other issue like you haven’t portforwarded, or aren’t setting up the IP it has to connect to correctly.

Ahh I see i won’t be able to portfoward until tomorrow because my ISP provide a router that does not enable you to portfoward, is there no way i can play offline just me until tomorrow i want to get on test things add shops ect… ready for a lunch and beta testing tomorrow.

If i defo need to portfoward to play offline(just me) could you link to me any other servers that are 317+ that don’t have to many customs

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting Client To Server
item.dc:creator: @staticfish1 staticfish1
item.description:
@staticfish1 wrote:

All compiling does is save the changes you have made to the client. You just need to run the server and client. And it is saying that because it isn’t connecting to any server that is being ran, because of some other issue like you haven’t portforwarded, or aren’t setting up the IP it has to connect to correctly.

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting Client To Server
item.dc:creator: @xron89 xron89
item.description:
@xron89 wrote:

staticfish1:

Your accidently running the compiler. I think the previous author had the Compiler and Runserver switched up.

Do i not need to compile the client for it to work :S because my client just says connecting to update server even though the console on the client shows no problems, so i was thinking compile the client and then run it might work.

or was i wrong

Read full topic
